name: Invalid domains
description: In a multi domain website, traffic is expected to be split into more hostnames. But there should be minimal amount of traffic from other domains not belonging to ownersâ€™ websites (typically domains like: google translate, google web cache). Hostnames starting with â€žlocalhost..â€œ are always wrong. In main view with clear data, these hostnames should be excluded.

blocks.description: It checks if there are hostnames containing localhost/google.translate/google.web.cache
blocks.failHowtofix: Check if there is some filter for exclusion of hostnames applied, if not, create one. It should be an exclude filter with defined hostnames you want to filter out.
